===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[jump]], to [[leap]], to [[hop]]
# to [[pass over]], to skip, to bypass
#: {{zh-l|跳級|to skip a grade}}
# to beat, to palpitate, to pulsate
#: {{zh-l|心跳|heartbeat}}
# to [[jump]] [<nowiki/>[[into]] or [[from]]<nowiki/>] so as to result in death
#: {{zh-x|跳河|to commit suicide by jumping into a river}}
#: {{zh-x|跳樓|to commit suicide by jumping out of a window; to jump to one's death}}
# to skip a part of a video
#: {{zh-x|我 絕對 不 跳 這麼 好聽 的 OP。|I will never skip such an awesome opening.}}
